remarks: The subspace sum of a closed subspace and an atom is closed.  TODO: see if proof at http://math.stackexchange.com/a/1233211/50776 and Mon, 13 Apr 2015 20:44:07 -0400 email could be used instead of this and ~ dihjat2 .  (Contributed by NM, 15-Jan-2015.)
statement:
dihsmatrn.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihsmatrn.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihsmatrn.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihsmatrn.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
dihsmatrn.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` U ) $.
dihsmatrn.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihsmatrn.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ran I ) $.
dihsmatrn.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
dihsmatrn $p |- ( ph -> ( X .(+) Q ) e. ran I ) $.
